message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm willing to give you 400k. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a good starting point. Your turn!
I'm not comfortable with a 70-30 split. I'll propose a 55-45 split. Your turn!
I'm sticking to my previous proposal. 55% is a fair share, don't you think?
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I think this is a fair split. Your turn again!
I'm still not comfortable with a 65-35 split. I'll propose a 52.5-47.5 split. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob. Can we meet in the middle with a 52.5-47.5 split?
